title: MineSDG
text: MineSDG R package designed help mining, minerals, metals professionals quantify impact United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). Unlike generic text-mining SDG tools, MineSDG focuses quantitative operational data specific natural resources sector (e.g., water withdrawal volumes, land disturbance ratios, rehabilitation rates).

title: MineSDG
text: package currently active development. initial release focus : SDG 6 (Clean Water & Sanitation): Calculating water recycling efficiency withdrawal intensity. SDG 15 (Life Land): Metrics land disturbance vs. rehabilitation. Global Reporting Alignment: Computes metrics aligned GRI (Global Reporting Initiative) Standards (specifically GRI 303 & 304) SASB Metals & Mining standards.

what: Calculate Land Restoration Rehabilitation Rate — calculate_land_restoration
title: Calculate Land Restoration Rehabilitation Rate — calculate_land_restoration
text: Computes rehabilitation rate disturbed mining land alignment SDG 15.3 (Land Degradation Neutrality). function evaluates percentage disturbed land restored revegetated reports remaining unrestored area.

title: Calculate Land Restoration Rehabilitation Rate — calculate_land_restoration
Calculate Land Restoration Rehabilitation Rate — calculate_land_restoration
text: disturbed_area_ha Numeric. Total land disturbed mining activities (hectares). Must non-negative number. rehabilitated_area_ha Numeric. Total land rehabilitated revegetated (hectares). Must non-negative number.

title: Calculate Land Restoration Rehabilitation Rate — calculate_land_restoration
text: named list containing: metric Character string. "SDG 15.3 - Land Restoration" percent_restored Numeric. Rehabilitation rate rounded 2 decimal places. unrestored_area_ha Numeric. Remaining disturbed land yet restored (hectares).

title: Calculate Land Restoration Rehabilitation Rate — calculate_land_restoration
text: rehabilitation rate calculated : $$(rehabilitated\_area\_ha / disturbed\_area\_ha) * 100$$ disturbed_area_ha 0, function safely returns 0 percent restored avoid division--zero errors.

title: Calculate Land Restoration Rehabilitation Rate — calculate_land_restoration
code: calculate_land_restoration(100, 40) #> $metric #> [1] "SDG 15.3 - Land Restoration" #>  #> $percent_restored #> [1] 40 #>  #> $unrestored_area_ha #> [1] 60 #>   calculate_land_restoration(   disturbed_area_ha = 250,   rehabilitated_area_ha = 180 ) #> $metric #> [1] "SDG 15.3 - Land Restoration" #>  #> $percent_restored #> [1] 72 #>  #> $unrestored_area_ha #> [1] 70 #>   calculate_land_restoration(0, 0) #> $metric #> [1] "SDG 15.3 - Land Restoration" #>  #> $percent_restored #> [1] 0 #>  #> $unrestored_area_ha #> [1] 0 #>

title: Calculate Water Use Efficiency (SDG 6.4) — calculate_water_efficiency
text: Computes water use efficiency recycling rates alignment Global Reporting Initiative (GRI 303) standards SDG Target 6.4.

title: Calculate Water Use Efficiency (SDG 6.4) — calculate_water_efficiency
text: withdrawal_m3 Numeric. Total water withdrawn sources (cubic meters). Must non-negative number. discharge_m3 Numeric. Total water discharged destinations (cubic meters). Must non-negative number. recycled_m3 Numeric. Total water recycled reused (cubic meters). Must non-negative number.

title: Calculate Water Use Efficiency (SDG 6.4) — calculate_water_efficiency
text: named list containing: metric Character string. "SDG 6.4 - Water Efficiency" net_consumption_m3 Numeric. Net water consumed (Withdrawal - Discharge). recycling_rate_percent Numeric. Percentage total water use recycled, rounded 2 decimal places.

title: Calculate Water Use Efficiency (SDG 6.4) — calculate_water_efficiency
text: function calculates "Recycling Rate" : $$(recycled\_m3 / (withdrawal\_m3 + recycled\_m3)) * 100$$ "Net Water Consumption" (GRI 303-5) : $$withdrawal\_m3 - discharge\_m3$$

title: Calculate Water Use Efficiency (SDG 6.4) — calculate_water_efficiency
code: # Standard mining operation example calculate_water_efficiency(   withdrawal_m3 = 50000,   discharge_m3 = 10000,   recycled_m3 = 20000 ) #> $metric #> [1] "SDG 6.4 - Water Efficiency" #>  #> $net_consumption_m3 #> [1] 40000 #>  #> $recycling_rate_percent #> [1] 28.57 #>   # Zero discharge example (Closed loop) calculate_water_efficiency(1000, 0, 500) #> $metric #> [1] "SDG 6.4 - Water Efficiency" #>  #> $net_consumption_m3 #> [1] 1000 #>  #> $recycling_rate_percent #> [1] 33.33 #>   # Edge case: No water used calculate_water_efficiency(0, 0, 0) #> $metric #> [1] "SDG 6.4 - Water Efficiency" #>  #> $net_consumption_m3 #> [1] 0 #>  #> $recycling_rate_percent #> [1] 0 #>

code: fetch_sdg_country_data(   goal = NULL,   indicator = NULL,   country = NULL,   year_range = NULL,   save = FALSE,   save_path = "./data/sdg_downloads/",   formats = c("csv", "rds") )

title: Fetch Country-Level SDG Data from UN SDG API — fetch_sdg_country_data
text: goal Numeric (1-17). Optional SDG goal number. indicator Character. SDG indicator code (e.g., "15.3.1"). country Character. ISO3 country code (e.g., "IND", "AUS"). year_range Numeric vector length 2 (start_year, end_year). save Logical. TRUE, saves data disk. Default FALSE. save_path Character. Directory path saving data. Default: "./data/sdg_downloads/". formats Character vector. combination "csv", "rds". Default c("csv", "rds").

title: Fetch Country-Level SDG Data from UN SDG API — fetch_sdg_country_data
text: data.table containing SDG indicator data.

title: Fetch Country-Level SDG Data from UN SDG API — fetch_sdg_country_data
text: least one goal indicator must provided. indicator supplied → fetch specific indicator. goal supplied → fetch indicators goal. supplied → consistency validated. country year_range act filters.
